data.actual_result: The Search Bar For Questions/Answers Goes Away
data.expected_result: Step One - Resize your window to like 1600x1000 or lower
data.short_description: The Search Bar for Answers and Questions in The Help Menu Disappears when in 200% Zoom Mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the help menu at the top right hand corner below the close button Step Two - Zoom using Ctrl + Step Three - Watch it disappear
